dmca.title: Mesotheliomaweb complains of metastatizing text again
dmca.body:
Sir/Madam: 

It's time to report another round of copies of MesotheliomaWeb and other mesothelioma websites. 

I write to complain about Blogger blogs that have copied material from a website owned by one of my clients. 

1. The copyrighted work at issue is text that appears on the websites Mesotheliomaweb.org and Mesothelioma-aid.org and mesothelioma-mesothelioma.com. 

2. The pages that infringe: 
http://treatingmesothelium.blogspot.com/2006/02/how-is-mesothelioma-diagnosed.html 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/diagnosis.htm 

http://mesothelioom.blogspot.com/ 
is a copy of the bottom half of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/doctor-patient.htm 

http://mesothelioma-one.blogspot.com/2006/06/mesothelioma-for-those-diapnosed-with.html
copies it's first three paragraphs from 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/index.htm 

http://china-exhibition.blogspot.com/2006/06/mesothelioma.html 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/index.htm 

http://mesothelioma-webs.blogspot.com/2006/02/introduction.html 
copies the bottom three paragraphs of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/index.htm 

http://tastymistake.b1ogspot.com/2005/07/mesothelioma.html 
Copies 4 paragraphs of text from: 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.htm 
Copies 2 paragraphs of text from: 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/diagnosis.htm 

http://curemesotheliomadisease.blogspot.com/2006/06/mesothelioma-diagnosis.html 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/diagnosis.htm 

http://xrudix2.b1ogspot.com/2005/11/malignant-mesothelioma-stages.htrnl 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/doctor-patient.htm 

http://whatismesotheliomadisease.blogspot.com/2006/06/how-was-this-diagnosis-determined-and.html 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/doctor-patient.htm 

http://www.mesocancerinfo.blogspot.com/ 
copies 3 paragraphs of text from 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/diagnosis.htm 

http://guru-mesothelioma-diagnosis.blogspot.com/ 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesothe1iomaweb.org/diagnosis.htm 

http://bidlord.blogspot.com/ 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/diagnosis.htm 

http://cure-and-disease.blogspot.com/2006/07/mesothelioma-stages.html#comments 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/stages.htm 

http://lungillness.blogspot.com/ 
is a copy of 
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/index.htm 

3. My name is Daniel Crean. My e-mail address is [private]@sitecoach.com. 

4. According to the registrar whois.markmonitor.com, the contact information for this site is: 

Google Inc. 
(DOM-345046) 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View 
CA 
94043 Us 
Domain Name: blogspot.com 
Administrative Contact: 
DNS Admin 
(NIC-1467103) 
Google Inc. 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View 
CA 
94043 Us 
dns-admin@google.com + 1.6502530000 Fax- +1.6506188571 

I cannot identify the individual bloggers who made the offending posts. 

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

Sincerely, 

[signed]
Daniel J Crean
